website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for an inexpensive lancing device to replace a higher end brand such as One Touch, this is definitely one to consider.
pros: Lancets are super sharp, with a long shelf life
Less expensive than One Touch brand
Lancets are triple-beveled and very sharp
Lancing device accommodates many brands of lancets
cons: Spring can wear out over time
Lancing device and lancets are from two different companies

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my keto mojo
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Works great with my keto mojo! Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Gertrude Wagner

customer_reviews.title: To thick of a needle for me.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do, fits the Walgreens Brand but for me with my tender fingers and skin. It is to thick ofna needle. I have my Walgreens brand next to the care touch brand. The needle is shorter and thicker. I prefer the longer thinner micro lances.
customer_reviews.author: robin counts-dedear

customer_reviews.title: Not such a great fit
customer_reviews.text: I use a Bayer lancet device, and these looked like a good way to save a little money, as they are cheaper on amazon than what I normally get at the pharmacy. However, I have run into several issues. I have noticed a few bent tips. These are a little small for either of the two Bayer devices I have used them in. This has resulted in my having to hold them in the device when trying to remove the cap, or the whole thing pulls out. The caps seem a little harder to remove. The pin seems a little shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Work
customer_reviews.text: Giving it 5 stars because, well I am not sure. I actually hate them, just for the fact that I have to use them. Painful, makes you bleed, why should anything like that be given any stars? lol They work as described and come in many different colors, none of which seem to ease the blood, prick or heartbeat in my finger. But hey, they are what they are and they work, same could be said for anything sharp. I will continue to get these for the rest of my life because they are so fun and whimsical, bright and joyful for something so bloody painful.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Work Great + Colors enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of Care Touch lancets - and my first with multiple colors. The lancets seem as well-made as the name-brand ones that came with my Contour Next meter and cost less. I've been using Care Touch lancets for almost a year and have never had a problem with them. The assortment of colors adds a bit of variety to an otherwise mundane daily activity. This order was shipped promptly and arrived well-packed.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: For those with diabetes you should check out these bargain priced lancets.
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has lived with Diabetes 2 for many years and since I must check my blood sugar readings twice a day I am always seeking out good quality lancets to use. When I saw this product for a bargain price (Care Touch Multi-colored twist top lancets, 30 gauge, and 300 lancets) on Amazon I decided to purchase it. I am pleased with the quick service and I found these lancets easy use when taking my blood sugar readings. If you have diabetes 2 and must take your blood sugar readings you may want to check out these multi-color lancets. Rating: 4 Stars. Joseph J. Truncale (Author: Pro-Systems Combatives Vol. 1,2).
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J. TruncaleTop Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: My father uses the Bayer Contour Next Blood Glucose monitor. These work perfectly. Funny thing - in the "RATE FEATURE" section there is a "COMFORT" option. I honestly didn't know what to say so left it blank - there is nothing "comfortable" about pricking ones finger to draw blood. ;) But as far as easy to use and functionality - they're great! I've purchased them numerous times for him. We'd absolutely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works to my expectations - they're lancets and they puncture my skin as anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I give 4 stars to these lancets. I didn't give 5 stars because I have nothing to compare them to as I am new to using a glucose meter. Honestly, my primary reason for this particular purchase is the cost -- they were cheaper than my local pharmacy. These lancets do their intended job and they shipped quickly so I can say that, unless my doctor tells me I no longer need to check my blood sugar, I will definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Fit My Meter
customer_reviews.text: The box says these lancets most lancing devices, but they don't fit mine. Unfortunately, I hadn't gone through the answers to all the many questions to see that they don't fit the Accu Chek Softclix. Also, the box says they come in 3 packs of 100 each. Not so...they are all loose in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Classic Peach

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great shipper
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite lancets by far. They are least painful. The Care Touch lancet device is the best one I have found with easy controls and it never "misfires". If you need to prick yourself for blood sugar testing, I highly recommend the care touch lancets and device. Maple Dealz was fast and efficient in their shipping and the product was exactly as described. They take pride in what they do. Would use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this system for a number of years and found it to work well. My only concern is that the face of the upper portion of the plunger device is impossible to clean, even using an ultrasonic cleaner. It appears that this is likely due to it being made of two thin layers of clear plastic with enough of a gap to allow blood to flow between them.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my keto mojo
customer_reviews.text: These lancets work great for my keto mojo. They fit just as good as the ones that originally came with my device. No issues at all, and 300 of them for this price is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Chike Ogbonna

customer_reviews.title: A hair too small for Bayer Microlet Lancing Device
customer_reviews.text: I am using them with my Bayer Microlet Lancing Device, and they are too small. They’re usable, but twisting the button off the tip, usually causes the lancet to pull out. I’ll stick with Mictrolet lances.
customer_reviews.author: manncer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: 300 count lancets are the bang for your buck. Works well in my Care Touch lancing device. Virtually painless and easy to use. Only one gripe, PLEASE AMAZON, FOR THE LOVE OF GOD, STOP SHIPPING MEDICAL SUPPLIES IN ENVELOPES!!! The box they came in looked like it had been beaten and mugged! Luckily none were damaged/bent up or the sterility compromised.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Consistent and ultra sharp
customer_reviews.text: These lancets are ultra sharp and provide consistent performance with minimal pain. Work great in my Bayer Contour EZ lancing device.
customer_reviews.author: George Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Good price for great product!
customer_reviews.text: These fit more than one type of lancing device that I have and seem plenty sharp and painless. At LEAST as good as the manufacturer's lancets. But then again, who am I kidding... they're probably both made at the same factory in China! But they work extremely well for me and last at least as long as the "name brand" ones. Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: VideoAddict

customer_reviews.title: Fair price excellent quality. Buy here with confidence
customer_reviews.text: Pleased at 300 lancets at the price I bought at. Perform just as well as a lot more expensive at chain store drug store. I can't believe people don't shop this stuff we have to use every day.
customer_reviews.author: LkCh Gus

customer_reviews.title: Crooked pins
customer_reviews.text: Many lancets have crooked pins. Have to toss because so not puncture well when angled.
customer_reviews.author: CED

customer_reviews.title: They Hurt!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I both agree, these things hurt compared the the last ones. I also found a bent one already, which may be why they hurt. My finger is sore a day after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and colorful!
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the colorful lancets that he can chose from every time he changes them on his Care Touch lancing device. Sturdy and well made. I thank the Care Touch team for putting thought into a little detail like the multiple colors. It makes it a bit more fun for the children that have to check their glucose levels several times a day. We also love that these lancets are also compatible with his Genteel lancing device.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable lancing. Weird thing is that the box says that these come in 3 baggies of 100 lancets, but rather came 300 loose in the box. Would've prefered the baggies. Oh well. They're still great lancets.
customer_reviews.author: KeziaPurrsTop Contributor: Violins

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that was recently diagnosed with diabetes. I will need these to test his blood sugar levels. Right now it's been hit or miss. I think I will need to start with 28g to get his ears to learn to bleed before switching back. They are definitely sharp and will do the job eventually. Most cat owners have to start with the thicker needles first.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Belshan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Lowest price per item I could find. The colors are whimsical - I can pick a different one every day :) They work. The only downside is disposing of them since they are not resealable. The top cap snaps off and can't be reattached unless I'm not doing it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced and they do exactly what they are intended to do. I was sick and tired of manufacturers who made proprietary designs and then doubled or tripled the price. In addition many times I couldn't find their product at my local store.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Bender

customer_reviews.title: Gud Product - Gud Price!!.
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well for what I need it for for this name brand product for what I need it for and I also like choosing my own colors when it's time to prick my finger for the Morning - Noon -And Before Bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: These are basically painless
customer_reviews.text: These are not the same as the 32 gauge that was prescribed and which I could get with no copay - they are better! Basically painless and that is why I am willing to pay for something I would ordinarily get with no cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Diabetic testing supplies can sometimes be quite expensive, but these were a great value. I could care less about them being multi-colored, just as long as they work properly -- and they do. This will be on my repeat purchase list.
customer_reviews.author: Derby Gisclair

customer_reviews.title: Great priced lancets
customer_reviews.text: I found these on amazon by mistake and I’m soooooo glad! Cheaper to order online than get locally at the pharmacy. They fit my machine perfectly too! Another ... Great Deal On Amazon
customer_reviews.author: grdane2000

customer_reviews.title: Twist Top Lancets
customer_reviews.text: These lancets arrived in a timely manner and were packaged well as I've come to appreciate from Amazon. The lancets are a variety of pretty colors. Each plastic coated lancet has an easy to twist off safety cap. The needle is sharp and I barely feel the pick on my finger when checking my blood sugar and ketones. I will purchase them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: great.
customer_reviews.text: Great choice buy them in conjunction with this  Great choice as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stares for ease of use. Let's face it, most of that use this product, don't find it fun I do like the quality , the quantity, and the value. I'm not sure why they are different colors, I guess it's to make it fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy B

customer_reviews.title: Having no problems with them.
customer_reviews.text: It is true that these may be a little less "tight" in the pen than the more expensive ones. But, they do not fall out for me. They make a hole just like the other brands do. These are a much better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Useless to me
customer_reviews.text: They do not work in the One Touch Ultra 2, Verio Flex, nor the Accu Chek. So they were no good to me at all. That's why they were returned.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: They have an even length on Needle so you don't have to readjust the poker thing every time.
customer_reviews.text: These are a finer gauge for an almost painless poke. If you set the poker thing too high it hurts. I can put it on the low 1 or 2 and get enough blood for blood sugar test. I like the colors .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long live the Lancets
customer_reviews.text: Talk about the best bang for your buck, these colorful little pricks are just perfect for daily insulin level checks. They are like my M&M's - I am saving my favorite color for last:) Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: L3

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: definitely not the best quality but gets the job done. It is not as good as Bayer but would recommend this for the price it offers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Err... The box was so damaged and there was no safety tape to show that it has not been pre-opened or [content] used. I would have expected better of a medical product.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbin

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I think they are good value for the money. Almost a years supply for so cheap. They are easy to use and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: They work just fine, are insealed plastic bags and who cares about ...
customer_reviews.text: They work just fine, are insealed plastic bags and who cares about the box they are packed in anyway. I'll be back
customer_reviews.author: Madjik

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I use the lancets prick a finger to get a drop of blood so I can test for high or low blood sugar.. They do exactly what they are supposed to do whitch is to poke a hole in my finger so I can get a drop of blood to test. They work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love care touch lancets
customer_reviews.text: Love care touch lancets. They fit my Dario meter perfectly. The colors make readings enjoyable. I have to test 4 to 5 times a day. So, the colors help. Neon colors would be cool! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Terri  Blaylock

customer_reviews.title: Practically painless
customer_reviews.text: Needle bends easily so if you take off the top at an angle, the lancet is no longer straight. Otherwise light, very gentle on the fingers and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing a pack of 100 at the local grocer, I feel like $10 for 300 is a bit expensive. This will be the last time I make that mistake. Other than that, the product is good and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: Great lancets, will buy again. Fair price!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Bought them to use with my KetoMojo lancet holder. Works well, soft on hands! Compact design. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: bmbs

customer_reviews.title: It a good amount
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mom she has to monitor her sugar for 6 months. I like the bulk quality and how coloful they look.She likes it simple and easy to insert into her little needle pen .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid they would not work with my Alphatrak 2 system but it fit perfectly. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

customer_reviews.title: Great value and high quality
customer_reviews.text: My dog is diabetic and I use these to pick his tail to get blood to test. He never even flinches so I assume they are pretty painless. Been buying these for about a year and always get the item quickly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these lancets. They are a little slimmer than the ones that I previously used. As such it is far easier to insert and remove them from the lancing device. The price is also great and the quality is high. I will definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Faithy

customer_reviews.title: Easy, cheap lances
customer_reviews.text: Far less expensive that what I was using. Work well and are relatively painless.
customer_reviews.author: Jboobe

customer_reviews.title: 1/3 the cost of pharmacy copay
customer_reviews.text: No brainer , these work well and are very economical. So glad we switched, $ 250 saved per year over pharmacy prices.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Frosty

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: More comfortable than other brands because the lancets are thinner, pretty colors, and great price. Happy I found these.
customer_reviews.author: HappyGal

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, but be careful, they are slightly larger in diamater than most other lancets.
customer_reviews.author: DavidR

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth insertion. Been using this product several years with no problems to report!
customer_reviews.author: Mantech9700

customer_reviews.title: Fun and painless
customer_reviews.text: These Lancets are fun because of the colors and I always get the perfect drop of blood for my strip to read.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bedley

customer_reviews.title: Try it you won't regret buying it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much as the description stated. They are made to fit most devices it certainly fit mine and are easy to use
customer_reviews.author: shanice charles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit on my Contour Next
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, I bought my Contour Next at Walmart February 2019. The box or needles does not come sealed but each needle has a cover attached securely. Great price! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Outside says they come in a bag to maintain sterility. inside they come loose
customer_reviews.author: Matias

customer_reviews.title: Universal Size.
customer_reviews.text: These lancets fit into every lancing device that I've used. Works well. Order of April, 2020 was received pretty much destroyed because AMAZON shipped it in a soft-side envelope.
customer_reviews.author: The Buddhist Witch

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These work well with my contour test kit. They also don’t hurt when I use them. Great quality for the money, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Abrisard

customer_reviews.title: Wow they fit my device perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and as described. I will purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie G

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than name brands.
customer_reviews.text: My insurance wanted to charge me $32.00 for 100 name brand lancets. These were $10.00 for 300, and worked just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Esti approved
customer_reviews.text: Im an esthetician & These are great for the price! Easy to use & quality is good
customer_reviews.author: mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: they are for sticking a needle in your finger....it hurts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!! It's a great value for such an item of high quality. My son whom is under the age of 10 uses these daily. He loves the bright colors and can't wait to change the next one out. We will be buying our supplies now!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality helped me with my GD I still have left less then half of the box
customer_reviews.author: Elena Darii

customer_reviews.title: Work Great with Contour Next EZ
customer_reviews.text: These work great with my Contour Next EZ and for a much better value than the Contour brand lancets.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my applications. I totally didn't waste money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jerome Graham

customer_reviews.title: THEY WORK JUST FINE
customer_reviews.text: A LOT FOR YOUR MONEY. NICE TO KNOW THIS WAS AVAILABLE WITH FRONT DOOR DELIVERY.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT SANDLER

customer_reviews.title: ... new to diabetes I treat my self to the fun colors of the lancets
customer_reviews.text: Being new to diabetes I treat my self to the fun colors of the lancets. Just makes the idea of poking my finger a bit less stressful.
customer_reviews.author: Petunia 11

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Received this product quicker than expected. Very good product. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: S. Speer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for acne spots. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Colon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good value, worked with my machine and only had to throw a few away for defect in tip
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good supplier and product
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use, fit the lance device, and colorful so they are easy to find. The supplier is excellent to deal with. Good with follow up to ensure delivery, satisfaction, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Theron S. Nunley, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. Good product, does what it says it will do. I'm not clear on what the logic is in having multicolor lancets but that's hardly an issue for me... <shrug>
customer_reviews.author: Larspa

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These lancets fit perfectly in my aunt’s pen and she was happy to see that they were colorful :) she expressed that she’d rather have the rainbow colors over the reg. Blue. I think it makes her smile (even if it’s a small detail). The only note I want to make is that the needles bend easily, so be careful when you twist off the tip. Otherwise these are totally AMAZING for the price
customer_reviews.author: Nalani

customer_reviews.title: Care touch lancets
customer_reviews.text: These Land sets are very sharp and very small and you hardly feel the stick at all.
customer_reviews.author: CatMac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They do exactly what they’re suppose to to with my contour next. I’ll be back for more
customer_reviews.author: Sue M

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. This was my second order. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get any better for the price! They work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J. Mata

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Variety of bright colors makes the process a little more bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Lupo

customer_reviews.title: lancets
customer_reviews.text: These were cheaper than the ones I was buying locally and instead of 100 I got 300 lancets which makes it worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: 406Bobby

customer_reviews.title: good cheap replacement
customer_reviews.text: they worked for me. used as replacement on a bayer contour next. work just as well as the oem ones as far as i can tell. a much better value than the bayer branded ones. recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I received them within 2 days as promised. They work perfectly. I like that they are packaged in resealable zip lock style bags (3 of 100 each.) These will last me for months since I only have to test once a day. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: L Bell

customer_reviews.title: Finally a lancet that works
customer_reviews.text: this is a good option - My mom is 81 and I had trouble with other lancets working - 99.99% effective. Great choice
customer_reviews.author: SBROWNEyedGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fine needle size makes these lancets less painful to use than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I've used other lancets, these are the best. Very fine needle makes it a less painful process. I was surprised what a difference it made. Love the colors too:)
customer_reviews.author: Spiffy

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Were not easy to use, had to prick finger multiple times
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as convenien as drum lancets for other lancers.
customer_reviews.text: These individual lancets must be inserted in the lancing device one at a time, then ejected into a sharps container. It is easier and more convenient to buy a lance that uses drum lancets.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: They're a little loose in the lancet device, but they work well enough otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: mLo68

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job.
customer_reviews.text: Work well with the machine I have. Easy to use and dispose of properly.
customer_reviews.author: Maggi

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly.The lancets fit perfectly into my tester.I also like the variety of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A.Lechien

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors, good number in the package--very good service ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors, good number in the package--very good service and follow-up! Got my package super fast. They are good lancets at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Keck

customer_reviews.title: Great Lancets
customer_reviews.text: Great lancets. What else can I say? They do what they are supposed to do and we will order more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rose66

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and cheaper than going through your insurance.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Vanderploeg

customer_reviews.title: Afforable
customer_reviews.text: I waited forever for the doctor to order for my grandma. Looked up online and these popped up. Works great. Price is great. Will order again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price on this product is good, they work well without bending in my lancing ...
customer_reviews.text: The price on this product is good, they work well without bending in my lancing device. The shipping time was excellent. Thanks for a fair priced, good product. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price for these lancets. They work as well as any lancet would, but the value makes them better!
customer_reviews.author: JB-Prime

customer_reviews.title: Joy
customer_reviews.text: Adds a little not to glucose testing. An activity needing a little joy.
customer_reviews.author: Rcoghill2

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: WAY cheaper than keto mojo. Love the product! Fast Shipping! Will purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: Repeat Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything you'd want in a lancet.
customer_reviews.text: Great value and great service. Has everything you'd want in a lancet.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Handley

customer_reviews.title: Good lancets and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Can buy in quantity and the price is right. 30 gauge is big enough to get a good blood drop, small enough to not hurt much. Quality control is good; no bent or hook-tipped lancets at all. Fit most lancing devices.
customer_reviews.author: Marie F. Nightingale

product_meta.title: Care Touch Multi Colored Twist Top Lancets 30 Gauge, 300 Lancets
product_meta.description:
Care Touch Multi Color Twist Top Lancets 30 Gauge, 300 Lancets

These Care Touch Lancets are designed to minimize the amount of pain you feel when pricking yourself.
With the tri-beveled tip it is virtually painless to prick your skin.

The Care Touch Lancets can be used with most standard lancing devices such as Microlet, Truedraw, and other generic devices. Pair these lancets with our Care Touch 10-depth adjustable lancing device. https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01DMFLHI8

These lancets can be used for:
*Blood testing
*Black Head Removal
*Removing splinters from under skin
*And many other uses
feature_bullets: MULTI COLORED - Why not make blood testing more fun? Great for kids to help ease the discomfort by making it more exciting. Compares to Microlet Lancets
TRI-BEVELED TIP - The lancets triple sharpened needles, minimizes skin trauma and discomfort
GAMMA STERILIZED - The Care Touch Lancets are gamma sterilized for a long shelf life

PAIR WITH CARE TOUCH LANCING DEVICE - Our lancing device is a best seller. It has 10 depths to choose from and is good for finger and alternate site testing. These lancets are compatible with most lancing devices. It is generic for Microlet Lancets
CARE TOUCH DIABETIC SUPPLIES - Check out our alcohol pads, pen needles, testing kits and more for all your diabetic supplies.
